message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider $100?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $125?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
I understand you're still not satisfied with the price. I'm willing to make another concession. How about $127.50?
I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $122?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about $129?
I'm still not happy with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to pay more than $120. I'm going to have to pass on this deal.
